summary.intent: Add visibility for the Remediate feature by updating the welcome page tagline to mention automatic fixes and adding a new Step 5 card to the How It Works page that explains the remediation workflow.
summary.outcome: Successfully updated EmptyState.tsx tagline to 'Evaluate and automatically fix...' and added a purple-accented Step 5 'Automatic Remediation' card to HowItWorksPage.tsx with four bullet points explaining the workflow. All 1219 tests passed, lint passed, and changes were committed as 91757d4.

repo: Project uses Bun as package manager and task runner (bun run test, bun run lint)
Project uses Biome for linting instead of ESLint
Pre-commit hooks run tests, lint, and typecheck automatically
How It Works page follows a consistent card structure: icon box + badge + heading + description + detail box with bullets

code.finding: Main tagline that communicates product value prop - changed from 'Improve context quality' to 'Evaluate and automatically fix' to surface remediation capability
Insertion point for new step cards - each step follows identical JSX structure with purple color used to differentiate remediation from analysis steps

workflow: Made parallel edits to both files simultaneously for efficiency
Ran full test suite (1219 tests) before committing to catch regressions
Used selective staging to only commit relevant changed files
